locations.title: Circle K | Truck Stop
locations.content: Circle K | Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice and friendly. Shower is $9.50 If you don't fill up, and a $5 deposit for a towel. I've read that most similar places charge $12 for a shower, so this and no wait was a pleasant surprize.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ priorities need to be a little different at this location. That being said the shower wasn‚Äôt very clean either there was some type of white tacky residue all over the wall and floor. Although the promise on the wash states that you get two ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but you can get some good food going to get some Popeyes there and get some good chicken get yourself a good shower service is nice parking is big it's comfortable and it's not all crazy all over the place of course you guys are ‚Ä¶
The folks here are very nice. There's a laundromat and a little mini theater and game room upstairs. The bathrooms were clean and nice. The showers are comfy and roomy. Adding photos of the shower.

It's never busy. Staff is very helpful and always smiling. They have a big variety of everything. You can shower do laundry even get your hair cut here. Great place. I prefer it over any other travel centers in the area.

The kid cleaning the showers 5/7/23 around 7:30p wasn‚Äôt even cleaning the showers. Literally walked up, threw fresh towels in and reset the door for the next person to shower. Wasn‚Äôt like they were busy and needed to get people in. We pay $ ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Went upstairs to the showers and a gentleman with great manners asks if I needed help. ‚Ä¶

Stopped in for a shower staff is nice, the showers are a little dated and small but are clean. Love that they give you 2 towels. Some pictures showed the showers being a lot bigger than the one we got.

‚Ä¶ so I could not sign in to TA One card.  I was denied a shower by manager, I can not give out Free Showers, after I spent 500 in shop, 200 in junk Bio diesel and 20 in Bob Evans.  Free shower? I spent 700 plus dollars and I‚Äôm not worth ‚Ä¶

Have been couple of time to fuel my truck and using shower! I was so happy so far! But today, I went to truck shop to change oil. The guy on the front desk is acting rude and easily angry for nothing! I recommend him to do his job ‚Ä¶

The overall Truck Stop is fine. I would certainly like to give it a better rating.  But I just had to pay $14.00  for the WORST shower I have had in many years. It was a nice room. It was clean and well maintained.  But I can easily piss ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ at this facility. Their shower reservation system is down, they don't allow the redemption of offers in the Pilot app, there's a dozen different coffee urns but only one has any coffee, and there's no hot food available. The staff is polite ‚Ä¶

i do get fuel here frequently and if i do go inside the personnel are always nice BUT i rarely do take a shower here due to the amount of mold/mildew that is always there. I understand that the showers get used A LOT but when there‚Äôs this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to get food at Denny's nice little way spot hidden in back to smoke. The guy cleaning the bathrooms (with all the tats)was cool helped with the busted lock for shower. Staff was nice, my waitress was great. Even if she didn't want to be. ‚Ä¶

Paid $20 for a shower after driving all day, then was told by security you cant stay at this stop more than 2 hours.....

Save your money, go to Loves or the TA .
Customer service is TRASH here.

The whole place needs a good dusting and floors. Plus the showers rooms........ a little bleach goes a long way. Great shower pressure and temperature. Everything food wise was very good. We had the roasted 1/2 chicken, mashed potatoes and ‚Ä¶
This is one of the worst flying I‚Äôd that I‚Äôve been to. Shower rooms are really small and barely cleaned. The workers are rude and racist. Stay away from this location if you are not white.
Shower was not even cleaned, hair in toilet and sink. Did not appear to be mopped either. Disgusting.

Wow. Showers are not clean. Looks like they are just mapping the floor with towels, and that'sit. I had to switch the shower room three times before I've got the one that was ok. In the first two floors, they had drippings from shampoo, etc ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a truck driver I hit several Flying J/ Pilot locations a week. This is the first time I ever went into a shower and the towels given from them actually smelled and felt CLEAN! Shout out to the wonderful lady taking care of this for us with ‚Ä¶

Handicap shower was great. Mom in a wheelchair so she showers here. My only issue and I hope it's fixed ASAP. Is the BLACK MOLD on the inside of the shower curtain. Please put a new on in there immediately.

locations.title: A & A Truck Stop
locations.content: A & A Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a TA now, nice big truck. Parking lot inside has a diner smells good. Lots of food options is high. Shower was clean and hot. They have the driver lounge as most do. Washer and dryer not set up yet. Staff is great. Would return
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 833 reviews ¬∑ 960 photos

‚Ä¶ We need lines t a petro . And that hot box on the store side was a horrible idea for biscuit options . The biscuit was so dry I couldn‚Äôt eat it and tasted nasty . Where is the point system at ?????? We like to shower but not for 17 dollars

‚Ä¶ fancy but a great place to park the truck. C store has everything you need. Restaurant seems to stay busy. Food is good. Shower is my only negative. It wasn‚Äôt clean. Toilet was disgusting. Thank God I took my own towel/bath cloth because ‚Ä¶

Nice clean truck stop. Mom and pop restaurant here good selection of food. Excellent bake potatoes. Friendly waitress. Food come out fast and hot. You can do laundry and take a shower. Driver lounge with a big TV.
Place is a rip off no free shower when you put fuel.on have to buy one

‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm driving. Friendly staff. Clean diner. Only missing one star because the shower didn‚Äôt have scalding water. Probably from the washer machines going. That said, he shower was only $7.50 and that shower money adds up. Everything you need ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ not good at all. Very rude ppl all around. I asked for a shower and I was told it could be days b4 one was cleaned for me to use, and from What I hear they're not even clean after they clean it. Yes there is a place to park and gas, but ‚Ä¶
This use to be a great stop to sleep shower and eat, now there's a bajillion trucks on the road now and everybody has a GPS now; Now everybody knows about it now. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ like to say the restaurant is really good and the food is great you can always find a place to park but do not take a shower I was in shower #1 and shower head didn't half work the water would change from warm to cold and then to so hot it ‚Ä¶
I have been going here for 12 years. I can get a good meal 24 hours a day and I have used there shower's many times. You can't beat this place.
